verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I WON'T BE SATISFIED
I WON'T B FOUND ALRIGHT
TILL I FIND
WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I CLIMB EVERY MOUNTAIN
I TRAVELEDTHE DEEPEST VALLEY
TO FIND
WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
YOU, YOU CAUSE THE LAME TO WALK
YOU OPEN LIPS TO TALK
YOU'RE EVERYTHING
AND THAT IS WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
YOU, YOU CALM THE STORM AT NIGHT
YOU TURN THE DARK TO LIGHT
YOU'RE EVERYTHING
AND THAT IS WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
MY SAVIOR, MY HEALER, REDEEMER
THAT IS WHO YOU ARE
CREATOR, MY MAKER, MY FATHER
THAT IS WHO YOU ARE
